headline: IBM Valuation in Focus as Quantum Advantage Race Heats Up in 2025
summary: Wondering what to make of International Business Machines right now? You are not alone. Whether you already hold some shares or are just circling the IBM story, the stock’s recent run is enough to catch anyone’s attention. So far this year, IBM is up an impressive 27.9%, with the past month alone delivering a 5.6% gain. Stretch that out to three and five years and we are looking at a staggering 138.0% and 225.6% return, respectively. Clearly, something has been working in Big Blue's...

headline: What Microsoft’s New AI Ambitions Mean for Its 2025 Stock Valuation
summary: Thinking of what to do with Microsoft stock these days? You are definitely not alone. After years of headline-worthy gains, the stock has cooled off a bit recently, dipping 0.1% in the last week and 0.8% over the past month. But step back and the bigger picture impresses: up 22.7% year-to-date, with a staggering 155.0% gain over the past five years. Microsoft’s share price history is full of signals, and each one has a story to tell about risk, resilience, and growth. Some of the recent...
